Text: FW Anker Coal Supplemental Indentureper our conversation I am forwarding you this email for your review If you have any further questions please give me a call at x Regards Akasha Redrick Bibb Forwarded by Akasha RedrickCorpEnron on PM From Paul Pizzolato ECT AM To Akasha nron cc Subject FW Anker Supplemental Indenture Forwarded by Paul PizzolatoHOUECT on AM David H Storper on PM To Paul Pizzolato cc Subject FW Anker Supplemental Indenture Paul I am forwarding a draft supplemental indenture regarding disclosure that Anker sent me last week You and I have more than of the issue ie we can implement this change and have more info from Bruce visavis the utility project and other items I have not hired counsel yet to review this but would be apt to use Coudert Brothers at the Company expense of course as they worked on the restructuring for us I thought it might make more sense for your inhouse counsel to review first and let us know how it would relate to setting up walls and easing any disclosureconfidentiality risks it could cause Regards David Storper Original Message From Judd Hartman mailto nkerCoalcom Sent Tuesday November PM To Cc Bruce Sparks Subject Supplemental Indenture Attached is a draft of the Supplemental Indenture which would effect the amendment to Section of the Indenture that you and Bruce recently discussed As you will see the amendment deletes the second sentence of Section that currently requires us to file reports with the SEC and replaces it with the obligation to post the information on a website the we own lease or maintain The rest of the Section is unchanged Please let me know if you have any comments on the new language for Section I look forward to hearing from you Thanks Judd Supplemental Indenture vdoc Supplemental Indenture vdoc
